amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 101 entitled "Preventing Terrorists from Obtaining Relief from Removal" from the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 109-4 to strike section 101 and redesignate the succeeding sections of title I accordingly.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 236 (Roll no. 28).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Nadler.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 236 (Roll no. 28).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
